casebody.data:
Sheldon FREEDMAN, M.D.; Pankaj Bhatanagar, M.D.; and Mathew Ng, M.D., Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Joseph Hardy, Jr., District Judge, Respondents,
and
Mark J. Gardberg, Esq., in his capacity as receiver for and acting on behalf of, Flamingo-Pecos Surgery Center, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, Real Party in Interest. No. 74726 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED FEBRUARY 15, 2018

DENIED.
